titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the library of Mr. Henry Cook, painter, deceased which will be sold by auction at his late dwelling house in Bloomsbury-Square, near King-Street in Bloomsbury, on Monday, the 30th instant, at three afternoon / by John Bullord.
titleStmt.author: Cook, Henry, 1642-1700.

titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the library of Mr. Henry Cook, painter, deceased which will be sold by auction at his late dwelling house in Bloomsbury-Square, near King-Street in Bloomsbury, on Monday, the 30th instant, at three afternoon / by John Bullord.

Bullord, John.

notesStmt.note: "Catalogues to be had at Mr. Parkers at the Unicorn under the Royal Exchange, Mr. Buck, near the Temple, Mr. Barnes, in the Pall-Mall, bookseller, and at the place of sale"
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
